There comes a time each winter when, as much as I love it, I start to miss the warmth of summer. While there’s little I can do to change that — outside of hopping on a flight to somewhere warm — there are some things I can do to create a summer vibe all year round. My three go-tos? Pulling out a summer-themed fragrance, popping on some great summertime music (Bad Bunny’s new album Debí Tirar Más Fotos has been a major help with that), and enjoying a fun drink.  

Now, a fun drink can mean a lot of different things, but for me, it typically means something refreshing, hydrating, and nonalcoholic. For the longest time, I was seriously searching for something that tasted like summer in a can, and I finally found it in Vita Coco’s Coconut Mango Juice. Trust me, after one sip, you’ll be imagining yourself oceanside, too. 

What Is Vita Coco’s Coconut Mango Juice? 

While Vita Coco may be best known for its plain coconut water, this delicious juice may just dethrone it as the brand’s premier offering. A sweeter take on its staple, this juice features a blend of coconut water, juice, sugar, and mango puree for an elevated sip that’s as delicious as it is hydrating. Not a fan of mango? No worries! It also comes in an original flavor, substituting the mango puree with coconut pulp. 

Why I Love Vita Coco’s Coconut Mango Juice

I love a drink that I can sip on anytime, and this juice is truly something you can sip on anytime. Whether it’s for an electrolyte boost after a workout, as a delicious accompaniment to a meal, or simply as something sweet and fun to sip on, I can (happily) drink this all day. 

I’m always a bit wary that juices might be a bit too sweet for me, but this drink is truly perfect. The mango flavor comes through beautifully while the coconut water does a great job of balancing out the sweetness. It’s also become a family favorite — I was shocked to see the box almost empty less than a week after I first picked it up. Needless to say, we could all do with a refreshing, transformative sip right now, right? 

Ready to try Vita Coco’s Coconut Mango Juice for yourself? You can pick up a 12-pack right now for just $24.99 — it normally retails for $37, so this is a deal I wouldn’t sleep on. And don’t forget to clip the 10% coupon to save an additional $2.50 on your order! Now if you excuse me, it’s time to pop on Baile Inolvidable and crack open a fresh can, cause I’m in need of me time and beach time.
